languages.text: "Боюсь, мои слова разгневают Вашу Светлость". {n}Клеменциа виновато склоняет голову, словно готова тотчас отдать ее на отсечение.{/n} "Печать, что вы ищете, была утеряна более четверти века назад. Ее Светлость Теодора фон Валанциус выписала из Империума новую сразу после кражи, однако... сами понимаете — путь со священной Терры неблизкий. Да и варп-шторма бушуют в Просторе. По сей день нам так и не удалось получить замену".

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, мои слова разгневают Вашу Светлость". {n}Клеменциа виновато склоняет голову, словно готова тотчас отдать ее на отсечение{/n} "Печать, что вы ищете, была утеряна более четверти века назад. Ее светлость Теодора фон Валанциус выписала из Империума новую сразу после кражи, однако... сами понимаете — путь со священной Терры неблизкий. Да и варп-шторма бушуют в Просторе. По сей день нам так и не удалось получить замену".

languages.text: "I am afraid that my words may anger Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia lowers her head in shame as if offering it up to be removed from her shoulders.{/n} "The seal you are looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

Ее Светлость Теодора фон Валанциус выписала из Империума новую сразу после кражи, однако... сами понимаете — путь со священной Терры неблизкий. Да и варп-шторма бушуют в Просторе. По сей день нам так и не удалось получить замену".

Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

languages.text: « Je crains que mes paroles ne vous mettent en colère, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Honteuse, Clémentia baisse la tête comme si elle présentait son cou à la hache du bourreau.{/n} « Le sceau que vous cherchez a été perdu il y a plus de vingt-cinq ans. Sa Seigneurie Théodora von Valancius en a commandé un nouveau à l'Imperium, mais... comme vous le savez, nous sommes bien loin de la Sainte Terra et, avec les tempêtes Warp qui ravagent les Étendues de Koronus, nous n'avons toujours pas reçu de chevalière de remplacement. »
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that my words may anger Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia lowers her head in shame as if offering it up to be removed from her shoulders.{/n} "The seal you are looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que mes paroles ne vous mettent en colère, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Honteuse, Clémentia baisse la tête comme si elle présentait son cou à la hache du bourreau.{/n} « Le sceau que vous cherchez a été perdu il y a plus de vingt-cinq ans. Sa Seigneurie Théodora von Valancius en a commandé un nouveau à l'Imperium, mais... comme vous le savez, nous sommes bien loin de Sainte Terra et, avec les tempêtes Warp qui ravagent les Étendues de Koronus, nous n'avons toujours pas reçu de chevalière de remplacement. »

languages.text: “恐怕我的话会让您很不高兴。”{n}克莱门缇雅羞愧地低下了头，仿佛要把头从肩膀上摘下来一样。{/n}“您正在寻找的印章，早在二十五年前就遗失了。西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯夫人曾下令让帝国境内送来新的印章，但是……正如您所知，我们离神圣泰拉太远了，再加上亚空间风暴在科罗努斯扩区不断肆虐，我们至今都没有收到新的印章。”
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that my words may anger Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia lowers her head in shame as if offering it up to be removed from her shoulders.{/n} "The seal you are looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕我的话会让您很不高兴。”{n}克莱门缇雅羞愧地低下了头，仿佛要把头从肩膀上摘下来一样。{/n}“您正在寻找的印章，早在二十五年前就遗失了。西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯夫人曾下令让帝国境内送来新的印章，但是……正如您所知，我们离神圣泰拉太远了，再加上亚空间风暴在科罗努斯扩区不断肆虐，我们至今都没有收到新的印章。”

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, meine Worte könnten Euch erzürnen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementia senkt beschämt den Kopf, als würde sie anbieten, dass er von ihren Schultern entfernt wird.{/n} "Das Siegel, nach dem Ihr sucht, ist vor über einem Vierteljahrhundert verloren gegangen. Ihre Ladyschaft Theodora von Valancius hat ein neues vom Imperium angefordert, doch ... wie Ihr nur zu gut wisst, sind wir sehr vom Heiligen Terra entfernt. Und da die Koronus-Ausdehnung von Warpstürmen heimgesucht wird, haben wir bis heute keinen Ersatz erhalten."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that my words may anger Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia lowers her head in shame as if offering it up to be removed from her shoulders.{/n} "The seal you are looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, meine Worte könnten Euch erzürnen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementia senkt beschämt den Kopf, als würde sie anbieten, dass er von ihren Schultern entfernt wird.{/n} "Das Siegel, nach dem Ihr sucht, ist vor über einem Vierteljahrhundert verloren gegangen. Ihre Ladyschaft Theodora von Valancius hat ein neues vom Imperium angefordert, doch ... wie Ihr nur zu gut wisst, sind wir sehr vom Heiligen Terra entfernt. Und da die Koronus-Ausdehnung von Warpstürmen heimgesucht wird, haben wir bis heute keinen Ersatz erhalten."

languages.text: «Me temo que lo que le voy a decir no será de su agrado, {mf|milord|milady}». {n}Clementia baja la cabeza avergonzada, como si estuviera ofreciéndose a que se la rebanasen.{/n} «El sello que busca se perdió hace un cuarto de siglo. Su señoría Theodora von Valancius ordenó que el Imperium le entregase otro, pero... como ya sabe, estamos muy lejos de la Sagrada Terra. Y con las tormentas de disformidad que asolan la Extensión de Koronus, no hemos podido recibir aún un reemplazo».
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that my words may anger Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia lowers her head in shame as if offering it up to be removed from her shoulders.{/n} "The seal you are looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que lo que le voy a decir no será de su agrado, {mf|milord|milady}». {n}Clementia baja la cabeza avergonzada, como si estuviera ofreciéndose a que se la rebanasen.{/n} «El sello que busca se perdió hace un cuarto de siglo. Su señoría Theodora von Valancius ordenó que el Imperium le entregase otro, pero... como ya sabe, estamos muy lejos de la Sagrada Terra. Y con las tormentas disformes que asolan la Extensión de Koronus, no hemos podido recibir aún un reemplazo».

languages.text: 「この答えが陛下の怒りを買うのかもしれないと恐れております」{n}クレメンティアは、まるで自分の首を切り落とされるかのように、恥じ入った顔を下げた。{/n}「お探しの印章は、約四半世紀も前に失われました。シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下が帝国から新しいものを取り寄せるよう命じましたが…ご存知の通り、私たちは聖なる地球から遠く離れています。そして、コロヌス・エクスパンスを荒らす歪みの嵐のため、今日まで代替品を受け取ることができませんでした」
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that my words may anger Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia lowers her head in shame as if offering it up to be removed from her shoulders.{/n} "The seal you are looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: 「この答えが陛下の怒りを買うのかもしれないと恐れております」{n}クレメンティアは、まるで自分の首を切り落とされるかのように、恥じ入った顔を下げた。{/n}「お探しの印章は、約四半世紀も前に失われました。シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下が帝国から新しいものを取り寄せるよう命じましたが…ご存知の通り、私たちは聖なる地球から遠く離れています。そして、コロヌス・エクスパンスを荒らす歪みの嵐のため、今日まで代替品を受け取ることができませんでした」

languages.text: "Söyleyeceklerimle sizi kızdırmaktan korkuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Clementia, sanki kesmeye kalksan gıkı çıkmayacakmışçasına utanç içinde başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Aradığınız mühür, yirmi beş yılı aşkın bir süredir kayıp. Leydi Theodora von Valancius Hazretleri, İmparatorluk'tan yeni bir mühür gönderilmesini emretmişti de... Bildiğiniz üzere Kutsal Terra'dan epey uzaktayız. Koronus Enginliği'ne musallat olan öteboyut fırtınaları yüzünden de henüz eskisinin yerine yeni bir mühür temin edemedik."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that my words may anger Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia lowers her head in shame as if offering it up to be removed from her shoulders.{/n} "The seal you are looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: "Söyleyeceklerimle sizi kızdırmaktan korkuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Clementia, sanki kesmeye kalksan gıkı çıkmayacakmışçasına utanç içinde başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Aradığınız mühür, yirmi beş yılı aşkın bir süredir kayıp. Leydi Hazretleri Theodora von Valancius, İmparatorluk'tan yeni bir mühür gönderilmesini emretmişti de... Bildiğiniz üzere Kutsal Terra'dan epey uzaktayız. Koronus Enginliği'ne musallat olan öteboyut fırtınaları yüzünden de henüz eskisinin yerine yeni bir mühür temin edemedik."
